abstract_summ: The epidemic pattern in Shaanxi had gradually shifted from imported case pattern to local case pattern, and the transmission of local cases was mainly based on family cluster transmission.METHODS: : Epidemiological data of 136 confirmed COVID-19 cases were collected from the dataset of COVID-19 in Tianjin.RESULTS: : Among the 136 confirmed COVID-19 cases, 48 cases were categorized as imported cases and their close contacts, which were the majority of early cases.All confirmed COVID-19 cases amongst the returnees were displayed by the spatial distribution pattern of the extent of COVID-19 infection.Results: Since the onset of the first index case on January 15, ten confirmed COVID-19 cases had occurred in the workplace, and the epidemic had spread from the workplace to 4 families, infecting 7 family members.
title_summ: [Epidemiological investigation on a cluster epidemic of COVID-19 in a collective workplace in Tianjin].[Epidemiological characteristics of COVID-19 in Shaanxi province].[Investigation of a cluster epidemic of COVID-19 in Ningbo].[Analysis of transmission characteristics of COVID-19 in Shaanxi Province].[Investigation on a cluster epidemic of COVID-19 in a supermarket in Liaocheng, Shandong province].[Epidemiological analysis on 1 052 cases of COVID-19 in epidemic clusters].[Comparison of epidemic characteristics between SARS in2003 and COVID-19 in 2020 in Guangzhou].[Analysis on cluster cases of COVID-19 in Tianjin].Epidemic characteristics of the COVID-19 outbreak in Tianjin, a well-developed city in ChinaEpidemiological Characteristics on the Clustering Nature of COVID-19 in Qingdao City, 2020:A Descriptive AnalysisThe epidemiology of reverse transmission of COVID-19 in Gansu Province, China
